statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT task_name, last_completed FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY last_completed DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Clean%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY last_completed DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'weekly' ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_name, last_completed FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE last_completed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency_per_month > 5;
SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency_per_month = 4;
SELECT * FROM TaskLogs WHERE duration_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency_per_month > 10 ORDER BY frequency_per_month DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY task_id;
SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month, log_date FROM MaintenanceTasks JOIN TaskLogs ON MaintenanceTasks.task_id = TaskLogs.task_id WHERE TaskLogs.duration_hours > 3 ORDER BY log_date;

SELECT task_name, frequency_per_month, log_date FROM MaintenanceTasks JOIN TaskLogs ON MaintenanceTasks.task_id = TaskLogs.task_id WHERE TaskLogs.duration_hours < 2 ORDER BY frequency_per_month DESC, log_date ASC;

SELECT task_name AS TaskName, COUNT(log_id) AS TotalLogs FROM MaintenanceTasks LEFT JOIN TaskLogs ON MaintenanceTasks.task_id = TaskLogs.task_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 3 ORDER BY TotalLogs DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT task_name, employee_name, start_date FROM MaintenanceTasks JOIN WorkOrders ON MaintenanceTasks.task_id = WorkOrders.task_id;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM WorkOrders WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT Employees.employee_name, WorkOrders.start_date FROM Employees JOIN WorkOrders ON Employees.employee_id = WorkOrders.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT task_name, last_completed FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY last_completed DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT assignee_id, COUNT(*) FROM TaskAssignments GROUP BY assignee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT task_name, frequency, last_completed FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY last_completed DESC;
SELECT task_id, assignee_id, assigned_date FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assignment_id <= 5 ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, task_id, remarks FROM TaskLogs WHERE LENGTH(remarks) > 50 ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency, last_completed FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE last_completed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY frequency DESC, last_completed ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_name, frequency_in_days FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_name, task_description, frequency_in_days FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency_in_days >= 30;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency_in_days FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency_in_days > 10;
SELECT log_date, log_details FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE task_id = 3 AND log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT assigned_to_user, completed FROM TaskAssignments WHERE completed = true AND assigned_date < '2022-06-30';

SELECT task_name, task_description, frequency_in_days FROM MaintenanceTasks JOIN TaskPriorities ON MaintenanceTasks.task_id = TaskPriorities.task_id WHERE TaskPriorities.priority_level = 3 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
